title: New Idea for ragers
body:
Hola friends,

I have come up with a new idea for angry people!
Just like honour system, we can "award" ragers with points! 
So they can achieve the badge or medal (like the honour or cooperative teammate one)
So everyone they play with knows they have anger issues :)

Hopefully riot picks this up :)

Have a great day one and all :)

replies.body: RIOT are against shaming people + everyone rages at some point.

I can see how this can be a good idea but can also make the person who is getting points for being angry sad and feel like they don't want to participate in the game. Also teammates might treat these players differently and judge there moves as on l
Purpose so.

Furthermore some people might abuse the fact that they can award points for anrgy players and just troll by awarding it to the whole team or the  person who is really the one angry awarding point to the nice players.

So I don't really think this will be a good idea.

once you get this badge you entire team labels you as worthless and crap at the game, I don't believe this is right, if they do add in this badge I would like it if they also added in a badge for skillful and crappy players. To do this they would take the KDA + assists of all champions with 18 ranked games played. They would also replace your average cs as support to the lowest cs average on all champions with said 18 ranked games played. 

After looking at all players in this particular division and weighing out their averages, all players will be given a badge.

Aqua badge = Amazing player 
Turquoise badge = Great player
Blue badge = Solid player
Yellow badge = Average player
Green badge = Bad player
Dark green badge = Quite bad player
Brown badge = Absolute trash

This way you could have for an example
Very toxic player emblem, into an Aqua badge. 
This would mean the highly toxic player would be allowed to trash talk everyone as he was the alleged best on the team.
Can we do this for bad players aswell just to make it easier to climb since no one wants to be teamed with speds.

You only get matched with people around your skill level, at least it tries.

He may be bad in some certain areas which you're quite capable of, but same can be said the other way around.

Not to mention if you get bad teammates, either enemy team will also get his fair share of bads this game or it may be next game. It mostly evens out.

The matchmaking takes your skill level yes but after you win 10 games in a row. It goes wow this person is alright we will put people of lower skill with him so that it balances out.  The problem is that it hits a point where most of your team has been delt loss after loss for what ever reason and this can get people nerves because they are genuinely trolls who only seek to make ppl mad and ruin the experience for other players. I agree there are times when people need to chill out but sometimes the matchmaking system fails. Riot have been over a thousand times and they will never get it right.

And just like Honour points it only rewards badges to the people within the top certain %.

So if they rage more than 40% of their games (and do get "honoured") since the introduction of "rage honour", they will receive the badge until it is slowly diluted by future good behaviours (where they don't get "honoured" anymore).

OP is a genius, no sarcasm involved.

So you wanna combat negativity with more negativity? Not a great plan. What'll end up happening is Trolls will seek to get the badge so they can troll harder, and people who are genuinely bad at the game (but bless their hearts for trying) will be made to feel like %%%% constantly.

Maybe you could stop making everyone angry...
